Package cs2030.simulator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrivalEvent
    The ArrivalEvent class to simulate the act of customer arrival.
    Customer
    The Customer class encapsulates information and methods pertaining to a Customer in a simulation.
    DoneEvent
    The DoneEvent class to simulate the act of Event completion.
    Event
    The Event abstract class that contains event's information.
    EventComparator
    The EventComparator class to create a comparison criteria for events.
    EventSimulator
    The EventSimulator class encapsulates all the events.
    GreedyCustomer
    The Greedy Customer class extends from the Customer class to distinguish between the type of customers.
    LeaveEvent
    The LeaveEvent class to simulate the act of customer leaves the shop when all the servicers are unavailable.
    SelfCheckout
    The SelfCheckout class keeps track of who is the customer waiting to be served in a common queue (if any).
    ServedEvent
    The ServedEvent class to simulate the act of customer is being served by a servicer.
    Server
    The Server class keeps track of who is the customer waiting to be served (if any).
    ServerBackEvent
    The ServerBackEvent class to simulate the act of server returning from break.
    ServerRestEvent
    The ServerRestEvent class to simulate the act of server taking a rest.
    Servicer
    The Servicer abstract class is used as the parent class of Server and SelfCheckout.
    Shop
    The Shop class maintains the list of servers and support queries for server.
    Statistics
    The Statistics class to keep track of the total waiting time of customers, the number of customers who left without being served, the number of customers who are served.
    WaitEvent
    The WaitEvent class to simulate the act of customer waiting to be served by an assigned servicer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EventType
    The EventType enum class that contains the different integer representation of EventType.
